definition.text: The Open Stage is where bot take position!

paragraphs.text: The strategy I want to backtest is based on 4h TF and the strategy is Long. This means that bot will Buy the asset to later Sell it (at a better price we hope!). To keep things simple, all I have to do is to indicate the TF in the Target Rate node using my full balance in the Target Size in Quoted Asset.
If our market is BTC/USDT then the Quoted Asset is USDT and Base Assest is BTC
